data.text: @karenharding123 That's so kind, thank you Karen! 💗
@Hannika83 Hope your dad is ok and you can stay well @Hannika83. 🌺
@SProctorGolf @R_McStravick Thank you so much, Stephen. Very kind of you.

@Hannika83 @R_McStravick Oh dear, Hannah. I hope you donâ€™t become ill, and that if you do your case is a mild one that passes quickly. And best wishes for your family as well. Such scary times, these.
@R_McStravick Oh so kind, Roger...thank you.  My mum has found a wee nip of gin helps the Covid cough, so will be following her lead if it does strike me. X
@Hannika83 Oh no. Hopefully symptoms not too onerous. Fingers crossed for you. Do let need know if I can help in any way. For example, if house bound, I can bring you bottles of wine! x
@R_McStravick Thanks Roger, my whole family has Covid and I'm waiting to see if I've picked it up from them yesterday.  Mostly all fine. X
@FionaSkillen Thanks Fiona.  My family all has Covid and I'm waiting to see I've picked it up.  Thankfully, mostly all okay.
@Hannika83 Holy moly. I hope you and your dad are feeling ok. x
@Hannika83 Sorry to hear that Hannah. What a day! Hope your dad is doing ok now.
